preset_info.title: GenshinInfo
preset_info.description: 基于Eight for kwgt 中的B05进行二次创作。\n原作者：酷安@ffbfe9｜www.coolapk.com

模块边长.title: 模块边长
模块边长.description: 在打开“模块方形”时生效

internal_formulas.shape_width: $if(gv(模块方形),if(gv(贴合边缘),mu(min,si(rwidth),si(rheight)),gv(模块边长)),if(gv(贴合边缘),si(rwidth),gv(模块宽)))$

internal_formulas.shape_width: $if(gv(模块方形),if(gv(贴合边缘),mu(min,si(rwidth),si(rheight)),gv(模块边长)),if(gv(贴合边缘),si(rwidth),gv(模块宽)))*if(gv(读条方向)=r|gv(读条方向)=l,(wg(gv(后端地址),json,.max_resin)-mu(ceil,(wg(gv(后端地址),json,.last_update)+wg(gv(后端地址),json,.resin_recovery_time)-dp())/480))/wg(gv(后端地址),json,.max_resin),1)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression: [b]质变冷却 $if(wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Day)>0,wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Day)+天)+if(wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Hour)>0,wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Hour)+小时)+if(wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Minute)>0,wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Minute)+分钟)+if(wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Second)>0,少于+wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.Second)+秒)$[/b]

internal_formulas.text_size: $if(wg(gv(后端地址),json,.transformer.recovery_time.reached)=false,1,0)*mu(min,if(gv(模块方形),if(gv(贴合边缘),mu(min,si(rwidth),si(rheight)),gv(模块边长)),if(gv(贴合边缘),si(rwidth),gv(模块宽)))*55/250,40)*gv(文字比例)*0.01$
